author: Emilio Salvador
description:
Author: Emilio Salvador, Vice President, Strategy and Developer Relations at GitLab The rapid acceleration of AI adoption is fundamentally transforming the software development ecosystem. As capabilities advance, they become increasingly integrated into the software development lifecycle (SDLC). The latest GitLab DevSecOps survey found that 78% of respondents globally use AI in their software development processes... Read more »

title: AI trends shaping software development in 2025

author: David Thomas
description:
Huawei has introduced the CloudMatrix 384 AI chip cluster, a platform for large-scale AI model training. It uses a high-density network of Ascend 910C processors connected via optical interconnects, and the company says it offers improvements to energy efficiency and the speed of training. The design purports to CloudMatrix 384 outperform GPU-based clusters, although taken... Read more »

title: Adapting engineering models to Huawei’s AI learning framework

author: Roman Kropachek
description:
Apple’s ecosystem doesn’t stand still, and neither can developers for the company’s platforms. With each new release of iOS, the line between mobile device and intelligent assistant continues to blur. From in-device artificial intelligence to spatial computing that expands the very idea of what an app looks like, the pace of change is accelerating. That’s... Read more »
